Class WordCollector

java.lang.Object
  WordCollector

public class WordCollector
extends Object

The WordCollector uses the TextReader to read an input text and measures the frequency of the words contained in the input.

Version:
(November 2013)
Author:
(Tony Beaumont)

Constructor Summary
WordCollector(String inputFile)
          Constructor for objects of class WordCollector.
 
Method Summary
 void eraseWords()
          Make all the words invisible.
 void generateDisplay(int percentToShow)
          To generate the display, this method will invoke the DisplayWords class to display the given percentage of the list of words that has been collected.
 void printReport()
          print a report that says how many words were collected in total followed by a list showing each word and its frequency.
 void setBlackAndWhite()
          Set the display to draw all the words in black.
 void setMulticolor()
          Set the display to use different colours for the words.
 void setStrategy(String strategy)
          Set the strategy to use when drawing the display.
 
Methods inherited from class
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

WordCollector

public WordCollector(String inputFile)
Constructor for objects of class WordCollector. The constructor will read in all the words from the input file.

Parameters:
inputFile - the name of the input file containing some words to be read in.
Method Detail

eraseWords

public void eraseWords()
Make all the words invisible. This will clear the canvas.

generateDisplay

public void generateDisplay(int percentToShow)
To generate the display, this method will invoke the DisplayWords class to display the given percentage of the list of words that has been collected.

Parameters:
percentToShow - a number greater than zero and less than or equal to 100 indicating the percentage of all the words to display. If percentToShow is less than or equal to 0 or percentToShow is greater than 100, the value of percentToShow will be set to 100.

printReport

public void printReport()
print a report that says how many words were collected in total followed by a list showing each word and its frequency.

setBlackAndWhite

public void setBlackAndWhite()
Set the display to draw all the words in black.

setMulticolor

public void setMulticolor()
Set the display to use different colours for the words.

setStrategy

public void setStrategy(String strategy)
Set the strategy to use when drawing the display.

Parameters:
strategy - either "random", "drawInLine", "outsideIn", "insideOut".
